notification.disabledMessage: To receive daily bedtime reminders, please enable notifications in your device settings.

sleep.title: FixSleep
sleep.subtitle: Calculate your sleep cycles for better rest and recovery

cycles.descriptionSleep: If you go to sleep at {{time}}, try waking up at one of these times.
cycles.descriptionWake: To wake up at {{time}}, try falling asleep at one of these times.

sounds.subtitle: Explore relaxing sounds to create your perfect sleep environment

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize your preferences and create your ideal sleep setup

card.title: Sleep Time
card.body: Set a bedtime reminder to build a consistent and healthy sleep routine.

card.title: Time to fall asleep
card.body: The average time to fall asleep is about 15 minutes. Set yours to better estimate your sleep cycles.

card.title: How FixSleep Helps You Sleep Better
card.body: We help you get better rest with personalized suggestions for when to fall asleep and wake up, based on 90-minute sleep cycles.
card.body2: These cycles include light, deep, and REM stages. Waking up at the right time helps you feel more refreshed.
card.body3: You’ll also build healthier habits with gentle reminders and calming sleep sounds to help you wind down and stay consistent.
